name: Disciple Tools - Questionnaire Plugin

sections.description: Disciple Tools - Questionnaire plugin is intended to enable survey forms triggered via an event (i.e., Contact/Group Meeting Completed) or on a schedule
sections.installation: (Required) You must have Disciple.Tools Theme installed before using this plugin. Once Disciple.Tools is installed, you can use the normal Plugin system to install the plugin.

upgrade_notice: Questionnaire is now a Custom Post Type
author: zdmc23
